text:
[Verse]
Moonlight so high babe
Stars shining bright
We dance in the forest
Under the midnight sky

[Verse]
Shadows they whisper
Wind joins the song
Hearts beating faster
Nothing here feels wrong

[Chorus]
Under the midnight sky
You and I together
Hold my hand tonight
We can last forever

[Verse]
Whispers in the dark
Echoes through the trees
Your eyes sparkling bright
Ever warm like seas

[Bridge]
In this golden dream
Time seems to sway
Moments we hold close
Won't fade away

[Chorus]
Under the midnight sky
You and I together
Hold my hand tonight
We can last forever
title: Under the Midnight Sky
